ComicInfo.Summary:
The world has faced the opening attack of a terrifying new power. Green Lama is the Earth’s most powerful being and he has been left in a coma. It’s up to the Project Superpowers team to come together to defend humanity. And who is the new host of The Spirit of The American Flag?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Francesco Mattina | 1 | B | Cover B | Ed Benes & Dinei Ribeiro | 2 | C | Cove C | John Royle & Juan Fernandez | 3 | D | Cover D | Philip Tan & Elmer Santos | 4 | E | Cover E | Stephen Segovia & Elmer Santos | 5 | F/FOC | Cover F | Sergio Davila & Felideus | 6 | G/RI | Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | Philip Tan | 7 | H/RI | Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | John Royle | 8 | I/RI | Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Francesco Mattina | 9 |
